channel.title: Starter screen tut
channel.description:
Hello. could someone help me with the following.
When a player first joins my server i want a screen to come up. The screen will have 2 buttons do tutorial and skip tutorial. when a player selects do tutorial it will take them to a sertain place and when a player selects skip tutorial it takes them to a different place.
could someone help me with this.
I have all the images ready but i have no idea what the code would be or where to put it. please help
